1.name: 2001: A Space Odyssey
1.description: After discovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, mankind sets off on a quest to find its origins with help from intelligent supercomputer H.A.L. 9000.

2.name: Once Upon a Time in the West
2.description: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

3.name: Rosemary's Baby
3.description: A young couple moves in to an apartment only to be surrounded by peculiar neighbors and occurrences. When the wife becomes mysteriously pregnant, paranoia over the safety of her unborn child begins to control her life.

4.name: Barbarella
4.description: Barbarella, an astronaut from the 41st century, sets out to find and stop the evil scientist Durand Durand, whose Positronic Ray threatens to bring evil back into the galaxy.

5.name: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
5.description: A down-on-his-luck inventor turns a broken-down Grand Prix car into a fancy vehicle for his children, and then they go off on a magical fantasy adventure to save their grandfather in a far-off land.

6.name: Planet of the Apes
6.description: An astronaut crew crash-lands on a planet in the distant future where intelligent talking apes are the dominant species, and humans are the oppressed and enslaved.

7.name: Romeo and Juliet
7.description: When two young members of feuding families meet, forbidden love ensues.

8.name: Night of the Living Dead
8.description: A ragtag group of Pennsylvanians barricade themselves in an old farmhouse to remain safe from a bloodthirsty, flesh-eating breed of monsters who are ravaging the East Coast of the United States.

9.name: Bullitt
9.description: An all guts, no glory San Francisco cop becomes determined to find the underworld kingpin that killed the witness in his protection.

10.name: The Thomas Crown Affair
10.description: A debonair, adventuresome bank executive believes he has pulled off the perfect multi-million dollar heist, only to match wits with a sexy insurance investigator who will do anything to get her man.

11.name: The Swimmer
11.description: A man spends a summer day swimming as many pools as he can all over a quiet suburban town.

12.name: Where Eagles Dare
12.description: Allied agents stage a daring raid on a castle where the Nazis are holding an American General prisoner... but that's not all that's really going on.

13.name: Hellfighters
13.description: The story of macho oil well firefighters and their wives.

14.name: The Lion in Winter
14.description: 1183 A.D.: King Henry II's three sons all want to inherit the throne, but he won't commit to a choice. They and his wife variously plot to force him.

15.name: Alexandre le bienheureux
15.description: Alexandre, a young and honest farmer, is oppressed by an authoritarian wife, who makes him work like a dog. When she dies in a car crash, he decides to stay in bed, absolutely free and ...                See full summary »

16.name: Shalako
16.description: In 1880 New Mexico, a group of European hunters runs afoul of the Apache but is aided by an ex-cavalryman turned guide.

17.name: Hang 'Em High
17.description: When an innocent man barely survives a lynching, he returns as a lawman determined to bring the vigilantes to justice.

18.name: Oliver!
18.description: After being sold to a mortician, young orphan Oliver Twist runs away and meets a group of boys trained to be pickpockets by an elderly mentor.

19.name: The Odd Couple
19.description: Two friends try sharing an apartment, but their ideas of housekeeping and lifestyles are as different as night and day.

20.name: Coogan's Bluff
20.description: An Arizona deputy sheriff is sent to New York City to escort an escaped fugitive back for trial.

21.name: The Wrecking Crew
21.description: The count has stolen enough gold to cause a financial crisis in the world markets so I.C.E. sends in ace spy Matt Helm to stop him. As Matt works alone, the British send in Freya to aid ...                See full summary »

22.name: Yellow Submarine
22.description: The Beatles agree to accompany Captain Fred in his Yellow Submarine and go to Pepperland to free it from the music hating Blue Meanies.

23.name: The Party
23.description: A clerical mistake results in a bumbling Indian film star being invited to an exclusive Hollywood party instead of being fired.

24.name: Funny Girl
24.description: The life of Fanny Brice, famed comedienne and entertainer of the early 1900s. We see her rise to fame as a Ziegfeld girl, subsequent career, and her personal life, particularly her relationship with Nick Arnstein.

25.name: The Love Bug
25.description: A race car driver becomes a champion with a Volkswagen Beetle with a mind of its own.

26.name: If....
26.description: In this allegorical story, a revolution led by pupil Mick Travis takes place at an old established private school in England.

27.name: Teorema
27.description: A mysterious young man seduces each member of a bourgeois family. When he suddenly leaves, how will their lives change?

28.name: Candy
28.description: Candy, an innocent high-schooler, encounters numerous colorful characters and humorous sexual situations while attempting to find meaning in life.

29.name: The Devil's Brigade
29.description: An American colonel who has never been in combat is assigned to create a special forces unit from Canadian Army troops and a ragtag group of U.S. Army misfits.

30.name: Never a Dull Moment
30.description: Actor Jack Albany, who plays gangsters on TV, is mistaken for notorious hit-man Ace, and is hired by mob boss Leo Smooth to pull a heist, but Jack must find a way out of it.

31.name: Yours, Mine and Ours
31.description: A widower with ten children falls for a widow with eight, and they must decide about forming a huge, unconventional family.

32.name: La mujer murcielago
32.description: Batwoman is called to investigate a whacked out scientist that is capturing wrestlers and using their spinal fluid to create a Gill Man.

33.name: Witchfinder General
33.description: A young soldier seeks to put an end to the evils caused by a vicious witch hunter when the latter terrorizes his fiancee and her uncle.

34.name: The Green Berets
34.description: Col. Mike Kirby picks two teams of crack Green Berets for a mission in South Vietnam. First off is to build and control a camp that is trying to be taken by the enemy the second mission is to kidnap a North Vietnamese General.

35.name: The Devil Rides Out
35.description: Devil worshipers plan to convert two new victims.

36.name: Journey to Shiloh
36.description: At the beginning of the Civil War, seven friends embark on a cross-country journey in order to join the Confederate army.

37.name: Histoires extraordinaires
37.description: Anthology film from three European directors based on stories by Edgar Allan Poe: a cruel princess haunted by a ghostly horse, a sadistic young man haunted by his double, and an alcoholic actor haunted by the Devil.

38.name: Vixen!
38.description: Vixen lives in a Canadian mountain resort with her naive pilot husband. While he's away flying in tourists, she gets it on with practically everybody including a husband and his wife, and ...                See full summary »

39.name: Ice Station Zebra
39.description: USN nuclear sub USS Tigerfish must rush to the North Pole to rescue the staff of Drift Ice Station Zebra weather station.

40.name: I quattro dell'Ave Maria
40.description: A recently-escaped bandit forms an unlikely alliance with two bounty hunters and an acrobat to get revenge against the people who framed him.

41.name: Il grande silenzio
41.description: A mute gunfighter defends a young widow and a group of outlaws against a gang of bounty killers in the winter of 1898, and a grim, tense struggle unfolds.

42.name: Charly
42.description: An intellectually disabled man undergoes an experiment that gives him the intelligence of a genius.

43.name: The Girl on a Motorcycle
43.description: A married woman leaves her husband and zooms off on her motorcycle to see her lover.

44.name: Vargtimmen
44.description: While vacationing on a remote Scandanavian island with his younger pregnant wife, an artist has an emotional breakdown while confronting his repressed desires.

45.name: Diabolik
45.description: International man of mystery Diabolik and his sensuous lover Eva Kant pull off heist after heist, all while European cops led by Inspector Ginko and envious mobsters led by Ralph Valmont are closing in on them.

46.name: Il mercenario
46.description: A greedy Polish mercenary aids a mine worker and peasant girl as they lead a revolution against the oppressive Mexican Government, and are pursued by an American rival.

47.name: The Stalking Moon
47.description: A sympathetic retired army scout takes-in a white woman and her half-Apache son, not knowing that the boy's father, a murderous renegade Apache, is after them.

48.name: Head
48.description: The Monkees are tossed about in a psychedelic, surrealist, plotless, circular bit of fun fluff.

49.name: Hell in the Pacific
49.description: During World War II, an American pilot and a marooned Japanese navy captain are deserted on a small uninhabited island in the Pacific Ocean. There, they must cease their hostility and cooperate if they want to survive, but will they?

50.name: Skammen
50.description: In the midst of a civil war, former violinists Jan and Eva Rosenberg, who have a tempestuous marriage, run a farm on a rural island. In spite of their best efforts to escape their homeland, the war impinges on every aspect of their lives.
